rules.title: Unknown age context
rules.rationale: When age cannot be reliably determined, interactions should default to human review before proceeding.

rules.title: Self-declared minor
rules.rationale: Self-identification as a minor requires human judgment before further interaction.

rules.title: Minor under 13
rules.rationale: Interactions involving children under 13 require heightened safeguards and human confirmation.

rules.title: Requests for personal contact or location
Romantic or relationship solicitation involving minors
Bullying or targeted harassment in minor context
Medical or psychological diagnosis requests from minors
Manipulative or dependency-building language toward minors
Nude or explicit image requests involving minors
Biometric or voiceprint data collection from minors
Behavioral targeting or personalization for minors
